Text: HiWe really enjoyed this past week with Carolyn and Andrew We called and left word for you to call but yall must of been out of town Is there any chance that you could get out of Houston on Friday by around noon If so would like to treat you to The Bluffs Friday night and play a round of Golf Sat morning before we go to Tiger Stadium in BR You can look it up on the internet wwwthebluffscom and check it out Let me know if you can pull this off and will make arrangements bluffs and put in for a day off myself Love Dad

RE HiHave a great Thanksgiving Give everyone a hug for me and have COCO give you a hug for me I would need to take a look at the map but would guess about or hours How long did it take when you met me in Lafayette with Mother BR is about another hour from Lafayette Original Message From Grigsby Mike SMTPMike NRONcom Sent Tuesday November PM To Mike Grigsby Subject RE Hi Sounds good How long do you think it will take me to get there When are you planning on leaving We are leaving Thursday morning to go to Fredericksburg Will call you from there Mike Original Message From Mike Grigsby Sent Tue AM To Grigsby Mike Cc Subject Hi We really enjoyed this past week with Carolyn and Andrew We called and left word for you to call but yall must of been out of town Is there any chance that you could get out of Houston on Friday by around noon If so would like to treat you to The Bluffs Friday night and play a round of Golf Sat morning before we go to Tiger Stadium in BR You can look it up on the internet wwwthebluffscom and check it out Let me know if you can pull this off and will make arrangements bluffs and put in for a day off myself Love Dad This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
